segments.text: Many of the slower dances are danced to the lyrics of tragedies . He meant that you turned it into a comedy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I'm glad I made everyone happy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He meant it in a good way . You added a little spice to the performance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm glad you guys all have such a good sense of humor . Ha-ha ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course ! That's why I always say , Eat , drink and be Greek !
segments.speaker: S2
